outfit_data.top: A flowing, ivory silk blouse with delicate gold embroidery along the neckline and cuffs. The blouse features billowing sleeves that cascade gracefully to the elbows.
outfit_data.bottom: Bronze sequined culottes crafted from a lightweight linen blend. The wide legs are gently flared, creating a romantic and whimsical silhouette.
outfit_data.shoes: Silver metallic strappy heels with an ankle strap for a touch of glamor.  The heels taper to a pointed toe and have a comfortable block heel height.
outfit_data.extras: A layered necklace featuring turquoise stones and hammered silver pendants adds a bohemian touch.
